## TemporalRangesTariffFormatOptions interface

Options to use when formatting in the [formatRange()](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariff.formatrange.md) method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TemporalRangesTariffFormatOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [allValue?](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffformatoptions.allvalue.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The value to use for a range equal to a field's bounding range, that is "all possible values". The default value is <code>&quot;*&quot;</code>. |
|  [wholeHours?](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffformatoptions.wholehours.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Format the minutes-of-day as whole hours, rather than the <code>HH:MM</code> format. |
